```{r}
library(readxl)
library(tseries)
library(forecast)
library(dplyr)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)

```

# Load Data
```{r}
data <- read_excel("./data/dataset_var.xls")


data_view <- head(data)
data_view %>%
  kable() %>%
  kable_styling()
```


# Visualise Marketing Variables

```{r, echo=FALSE}
ts.plot(data$Revenues, col="blue", main="Revenues")
ts.plot(data$Flyer, col="red", main="Flyers")
ts.plot(data$Catalog, col="red", main="Catalog")
ts.plot(data$Adwords, col="darkgreen", main="Adwords")
ts.plot(data$Emailing, col="red", main="Email")


```
